replies.body:
As a guy who has been doing YouTube for a little while now, I can tell you that you're probably going to lose viewers with that intro. You might like that part of the song, but statistics show that a lot of viewers close the video because they get bored by a super long intro.
I'd recommend an intro that's around 7 seconds long :)
replies.body_tagged:

I'd recommend an intro that's around 7 seconds long :)
